text: Graptophyllum repandum is a species of plant in the family Acanthaceae. It is endemic to Fiji. ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998 ==See also== * IUCN Red List ==External links== * Graptophyllum repandum Category:Endemic flora of Fiji Category:Graptophyllum Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Graptophyllum repandum
